experience.title: Marketing Intern
responsibilities: Assisted in the management of social media accounts, increasing follower engagement by 15% through curated content and community interaction.
Conducted weekly market research reports on competitor advertising strategies and presented findings to the creative team.
Drafted and scheduled promotional emails using industry-standard automation platforms for a database of 10,000 subscribers.
Supported the event coordination team during the planning and execution of two regional product launch events.

experience.title: Junior Marketing Coordinator
responsibilities: Collaborated with the content team to develop SEO-optimized blog posts that drove a 20% increase in organic web traffic.
Monitored and reported on campaign performance metrics using Google Analytics to provide actionable insights for future budget allocation.
Maintained the company marketing calendar, ensuring all cross-departmental deadlines for campaign assets were met.
Liaised with external vendors to order promotional materials and ensure brand consistency across all physical touchpoints.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
